          EPOS, EPOS Recommends

          13 Best Yoga Classes in Singapore

          Posted on June 22, 2022November 25, 2022 by Adrija Chakravarti

          A lot of people go to gyms in Singapore to workout and build their core strength and stamina. But if you’re tired of the gym or you’ve become the resident couch potato at your home, yoga can be a great way to pull yourself out of that fitness slump. It can be practised by anyone, never mind your fitness level or age. So for those of you who want to exercise your flexibility and zen, we know exactly what you need. That’s why we’ve collected 10 of the best yoga classes in Singapore for you to try out!

          Start your yoga journey one Downward Dog at a time!

          Contents hide
          Best yoga classes in Singapore
          1. Hom Yoga
          2. Yoga Movement
          3. Sweatbox Yoga
          4. On Good Ground
          5. Freedom Yoga
          6. Platinum Yoga
          7. Pure Yoga
          8. Yoga+
          9. Yoga In Common
          10. Yoga Lab
          11. Core Collective
          12. OhmSantih Yoga
          13. Hale Yoga
          Conclusion
          Related Posts

          Best yoga classes in Singapore

          1. Hom Yoga

          Source: Hom Yoga via Facebook – Yoga Classes Singapore

          Facebook: Visit Here

          Instagram: Visit Here

          Website: https://homyoga.com/

          Address: Locations

          Operating Hours: Mon-Fri, 6:30am-9:30pm | Sat-Sun, 7:30am-6:30pm

          Hom Yoga’s principles of transformation and empowerment permeate their teaching style and practice of yoga. Here, you’ll find a deep sense of purpose and dedicated teachers who will help you reach your fitness goals. As such, they offer a comprehensive list of yoga classes in Singapore from Hatha, Ashtanga and Vinyasa yoga to Yin yoga, meditation and Anusara yoga. This studio also offers a range of prenatal, postpartum and yoga classes for babies and kids. Breathe, align your mind and body, and move towards inner healing at Hom Yoga.

          2. Yoga Movement

          Source: Yoga Movement via Facebook – Yoga Classes Singapore

          Facebook: Visit Here

          Instagram: Visit Here

          Website: https://www.yogamovement.com/

          Address: Locations

          Operating Hours: Locations

          At Yoga Movement, you’re not just going to yoga classes; you’re joining a passionate community grounded in approachability, accessibility and most importantly, good culture. New to yoga? Go back to basics with their Basic and Hot Basics yoga classes in Singapore. Or if you’re looking for a faster pace, choose their HIIT yoga, Power Flow and Core classes to really get a good strength workout. Sweat it up with their YM signature yoga class, Monster Hot, where you’ll focus on your strength, flexibility and endurance in an extended session. And finally, bring it back to a slow pace and work on your breath with Zen. Each yoga class is meant to target different parts of your body and mind, offering a holistic range of classes for you to choose from. Join the #YMFAM today!

          3. Sweatbox Yoga

          Source: Sweatbox Yoga via Facebook – Yoga Classes Singapore

          Facebook: Visit Here

          Instagram: Visit Here

          Website: https://www.sweatboxyoga.com.sg/

          Address: Locations

          This premium boutique yoga studio in Singapore specialises in hot and regular yoga, offering a fun and safe environment for anyone, beginners or experts, to practice yoga and improve their wellbeing. With yoga movements and routines that focus on core strength, flexibility and cardiovascular benefits, you’ll be guided through your yoga journey by expert hands. Sweatbox Yoga offers 5 different hot yoga classes as well as Hatha, Vinyasa, Flow and Yin yoga. Then, relax and rejuvenate your body with meditation and therapeutic Flow classes.

          Sweatbox Yoga also offers other types of fitness classes like Yogalates, barre intensity and power pilates. And no matter your age, they have something for everyone. Seniors will enjoy a functional movement and mobility class to help keep them active while kids practice fun, dynamic yoga poses to improve flexibility and self-discipline!

          4. On Good Ground

          Source: On Good Ground via Facebook – Yoga Classes Singapore

          Facebook: Visit Here

          Instagram: Visit Here

          Website: https://ongoodground.com/

          Address: 458B Joo Chiat Rd, Singapore 427671

          Reach your zen with mindful movement, balance and conscious breathing. On Good Ground is not your typical yoga studio. Offering not only yoga classes in Singapore like Hatha, Yin, Flow and Vinyasa, they also focus on barre as a fundamental practice. You can opt for classes like barre basics, sculpt, cardio, ballet and even prenatal barre. At On Good Ground, all you need to do is move, breath and be present.

          5. Freedom Yoga

          Source: Freedom Yoga via Facebook – Yoga Classes Singapore

          Facebook: Visit Here

          Instagram: Visit Here

          Website: https://www.freedomyoga.sg/

          Address: Locations

          Operating Hours: Open during class times

          Connect your mind and body in a tranquil sanctuary at Freedom Yoga. While they have your classic yoga classes like basics, power, Flow and Vinyasa, that’s not their main draw. Choose from four Hatha classes that are tailored to the specific body parts you want to focus on! Interested in stretching your hips and hamstrings? Backbends or arm balance asanas? Or maybe you’re ready to go upside down and focus on strength and flexibility that way.

          Plus they have new and unique classes that will bring you mindfulness, calm and inner strength through guided meditation and Flow. After practising yoga at Freedom Yoga, you’ll be energised, rejuvenated and on your way to healing your mind and body. You’ll feel free!

          6. Platinum Yoga

          Source: Platinum Yoga via Facebook – Yoga Classes Singapore

          Facebook: Visit Here

          Instagram: Visit Here

          Website: https://platinumyoga.com/

          Address: Locations

          Transform your practice of yoga with a complete mind and body experience at Platinum Yoga. Here, you’ll find an inclusive and supportive environment for everyone to learn and grow. They also believe that yoga is for everybody and that there is no limit to the number of ways you can practice it. At Platinum Yoga, you can choose from a large and holistic collection of yoga classes that each focus on one of the 5 elements of yoga: air, water, earth, space and fire. You can find any of the classic yoga classes or choose something a bit different.

          Take your yoga journey one step higher and fly with aerial yoga! Or use breathing and meditation to bring harmony and balance to your mind and body. You can also deepen your yoga practice with specially tailored personal training classes. With over 40 classes offered, Platinum Yoga ensures that there is something for everyone, and that they can guide you through your wellbeing journey.

          7. Pure Yoga

          Source: Pure Yoga via Facebook – Yoga Classes Singapore

          Facebook: Visit Here

          Instagram: Visit Here

          Website: https://www.pure-yoga.com/singapore

          Address: Locations

          Operating Hours: Locations

          Are you interested in exploring yoga in a diverse, dedicated and guided environment? With spacious practice rooms decked out with wall ropes, aerial silks, mats and yoga blocks, you’ve got everything you need to start your yoga journey here at Pure Yoga. They offer a wide variety of yoga classes in Singapore, ranging from traditional Hatha, Ashtanga and Mysore yoga to contemporary classes like Power, Wall Rope and Aerial yoga classes. Each class they offer addresses one of Pure Yoga’s own 5 Pillars: Healing, Grounding, Dynamic, Hot and Specialised. And after you’re done with your class, why not grab a refreshing juice smoothie at their juice bar, and relax in the chill-out lounge?

          8. Yoga+

          Source: Yoga+ via Facebook – Yoga Classes Singapore

          Facebook: Visit Here

          Instagram: Visit Here

          Website: https://www.yogaplus.sg/

          Address: Locations

          Yoga+ explores a world of yoga beyond its asanas, revolutionising how yoga is practised everyday. With three locations across the island, Yoga+ offers a range of yoga classes in Singapore to give everyone, from beginners to experts, a holistic experience. From basic to flow, restore to revitalise and even classes designed to get you comfortable with handstands and balance, their schedule is packed with fun and worthwhile classes. And the best part? Don’t want to physically go to the studio? Don’t worry, Yoga+ offers some classes as an online livestream, so you can do yoga in the comfort of your own home!

          9. Yoga In Common

          Source: Yoga in Common via Facebook – Yoga Classes Singapore

          Facebook: Visit Here

          Instagram: Visit Here

          Website: https://yoga-incommon.com/

          Address: 22 Petain Road, Singapore 208095

          At Yoga in Common, you’ll find a peaceful and compassionate boutique studio to practice mindfulness and yoga. Here, they have 4 types of classes: classic, creative, calming and special. Practice traditional yoga like Hatha, Ashtanga and Vinyasa, find balance and self-awareness with Yoga in Common’s creative yin yang and flow by candlelight classes, and finally, slow down your fast-paced life a little bit with their calming yoga classes. They also have special workshops, so watch out for those on their Facebook page. Also, if you’re thinking about diving even deeper into yoga, Yoga in Common offers calming and enjoyable retreats, so you can practice yoga and make some new friends!

          10. Yoga Lab

          Source: Lab Studios via Facebook – Yoga Classes Singapore

          Facebook: Visit Here

          Instagram: Visit Here

          Website: https://www.labstudios.com/yogalab

          Address: Locations

          Through their expert guidance, Yoga Lab empowers their students to explore possibilities and reach newer heights. With their unique approach to yoga, the “lab” has created sequences based on muscle groups for optimal results. Their selection of well-designed classes will leave you stronger and happier than when you entered the studio. Yoga Lab’s got everything from the basics to essentials, Flow, Yin, Vinyasa and prenatal. Yoga Lab also practices Baptiste methodology in their teachings, as a Baptiste Power Yoga Affiliate. Choose whether you want a restorative, nurturing session or to take it up a notch with a sweat-inducing, intense workout. It’s up to you!

          11. Core Collective

          Source: Core Collective via Facebook

          Facebook: Visit Here

          Instagram: Visit Here

          Website: https://www.corecollective.sg/

          Address: Locations

          Operating Hours: Locations

          Torn between going to the gym and doing some yoga? Don’t sweat it! Or rather, do, because at Core Collective, you can get both! They have group yoga classes and meditation sessions for you to choose from. What do you want to gain out of a yoga class: an athletic workout or meditative rejuvenation? Besides that, as a fully fledged gym, Core Collective also offers several other workout classes including Les Mills, HIIT and bootcamp, pilates, reformer and more! From group classes to personal training, kid-friendly classes and even wellness services, Core Collective’s got it all!

          12. OhmSantih Yoga

          Source: OhmSantih Yoga via Facebook – Yoga Classes Singapore

          Facebook: Visit Here

          Instagram: Visit Here

          Website: https://www.ohmsantih.com/

          Address: 219 Jalan Kayu, Singapore 799442

          With less than 6 people per class, OhmSantih’s teachers dedicate their attention towards individual needs, and provide quality guidance during your yoga classes. Enjoy personalised lessons catered to your needs and get the most out of your membership. They offer Flow, Ashtanga, meditation, prenatal and postnatal, and kids yoga classes in Singapore. OhmSantih Yoga also helps rehabilitate their practitioners with yoga therapy sessions. When you sign up with OhmSantih, you join more than just yoga lessons, you join a close-knit community of yoga enthusiasts!

          13. Hale Yoga

          Source: Hale Yoga via Facebook – Yoga Classes Singapore

          Facebook: Visit Here

          Instagram: Visit Here

          Website: https://hale.sg/

          Address: Locations

          Trying yoga to reach your fitness and wellness targets? Stay hale and hearty with Hale Yoga! This contemporary yoga studio offers yoga classes in Singapore for anyone who wants to transform their body and mind. When you join, you’ll find all the classic yoga types, but also some new twists, like Hatha, Yin Yang and Wheel Vinyasa. But Hale Yoga’s specialty? Aerial yoga. They offer several variations of aerial yoga for all types of Yogis and experiences, like Aerial Silk, Aerial Vinyasa and Aerial Spin Flow. That’s not all! Hale Yoga is a very socially active studio and works with charities to give back to their local community!

          Conclusion

          Are you ready to embark on your yoga journey? We hope one of these studios offering yoga classes in Singapore will be your guide to better wellness!

          Start your day with a Sun Salutation and end your day with a Moon Salutation to bring balance, relief and strength to your mind and body!

          • Written by Adrija Chakravarti
